summary: Makes the fins of Ebony arrows glow, so you can find them.
descriptionHtml:
Makes the fins (fletchings) on Ebony Arrows glow.  There are two versions, one with just the glowing fins, the other with an aura surrounding the fins.  See the images.

This is a mesh and texture replacer; there is no ESP, so load order is not an issue. Any other mod that replaces the Ebony Arrow meshes will conflict with this mod, though probably not catastrophically. Whichever mod you installed (not loaded, INSTALLED) last will win.

INSTALLATION

Either use NMM, or just extract to your Skyrim folder.

REMOVAL

Use NMM.  Really.

SIMILAR

I\'ve done several similar mods:
Daedric Arrows: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/42792/?
Nordic Arrows from Dragonborn: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/43433/?
Dragonbone Arrows from Dawnguard: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/43497/?
Nordic Dragonbone Arrows from AeonVita\'s Dragonbone Weapons mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/43087/?
author: Gizmologist
